verses.name: Revelation 18:17
verses.text: For in one hour so great riches is come to nought. And every shipmaster, and all the company in ships, and sailors, and as many as trade by sea, stood afar off,

verses.name: Revelation 18:18
verses.text: And cried when they saw the smoke of her burning, saying, What city is like unto this great city!

verses.name: Revelation 18:19
verses.text: And they cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and wailing, saying, Alas, alas, that great city, wherein were made rich all that had ships in the sea by reason of her costliness! for in one hour is she made desolate.
